name: PivotTableCollectionExt
description: A collection of all the┬áPivotTable┬áobjects in the specified workbook.

methods.name: add
methods.description: Adds a new PivotTable report. Returns a┬áPivotTable┬áobject.
methods.signature: add(name: string, address: Range, pivotCache: PivotCache)

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The name of the new PivotTable report.

parameters.name: address
parameters.description: The cell in the upper-left corner of the PivotTable report's destination range (the range on the worksheet where the resulting report will be placed). You must specify a destination range on the worksheet that contains the PivotTables object specified by expression.

parameters.name: pivotCache
parameters.description: The PivotTable cache on which the new PivotTable report is based. The cache provides data for the report.
